mapper.select: select count(*) from minihome_visitor_notes a where minihome_no = #{value}

select b.visitor_note_no as no, b.minihome_no as miniHomeNo, b.user_no as userNo, c.user_name as userName, c.user_photo as userPhoto, b.visitor_note_content as content, b.visitor_note_secret as secret, b.visitor_note_deleted as deleted, b.visitor_note_created_date as createdDate from (select row_number() over(order by a.visitor_note_created_date desc) rn, a.* from minihome_visitor_notes a where minihome_no = #{miniHomeNo}) b, latte_users c where b.user_no = c.user_no
and rn >= #{begin} and rn <= #{end}
